flawed_nl_solution:
They started with 124 passengers. 58 got off and 24 got on so 124-58+24 = <<124-58+24=89>>89
89 people flew to NC where 47 passengers got off and 14 got on. This flight now had 89-47+14 = <<89-47+14=56>>56
There were also 10 crew members so 56+10 = 66 passengers landed in Virginia
#### 66

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 89. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
